explanation: Funds are required to support the Special Victimsâ€™ Counsel Program, counsel and capabilities, in accordance with section 8059 of division C. of Public Law 115-31, the Department of Defense Appropriations Act, FY 2017, to provide legal assistance to eligible victims of an alleged sex-related offense and to enhance investigations and prosecutions of allegations of child abuse, serious domestic or sexual offenses and to provide support for such victims.
